active_incidents.title: We are actively looking into an issue with Linux app installations

notes.body: We’re still looking into the cause of users experiencing difficulties when installing Linux. No additional news to share just yet but we’ll provide new information as soon as it’s available.

Our team is still investigating the issue but in the meantime users can install Slack from the snap store here: https://snapcraft.io/slack or download directly from our website: https://slack.com/downloads/linux.

Slack is experiencing problems with our Linux Packagecloud repository. This is preventing customers from installing or updating the app in this way. Our team is looking into it and we will share more information shortly.
